item.title: Strolling through the Internet
item.description: I don’t want to rush through life, clicking link after link without ever having the opportunity to stop and enjoy the scenery.

item.title: Well-worn Software
item.description: What would software look like if it aged? Imagine a computing interface that became less and less “new” the more you used it.
